title: All Things Cannabis With Alan Brochstein
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Alan Brochstein is the founder of 420 Investor with over 20 years of experience in fixed-income and stocks, and is now focused solely on the cannabis industry. He talked with Rena Sherbill about his path to the sector, what investors should be focusing on and why most people in the industry don't actually want legalization. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
